title: Write Your Own Murder Mystery
description: Whodunnit, you ask? YOU decide, when you learn to write your own murder mystery in this thrilling workshop.
webDescription:
In this writing workshop, author Roderick Leeuwenhart will guide you into writing a short murder mystery, like the famous stories Agatha Christie wrote in the roaring 20s. You'll learn writing techniques on building suspense and how to create a good plot twist -- and then start writing, of course! If you're at a loss for where to start, you'll be provided with several writing prompts. There's no time pressure to finish the story during the workshop, sharing your results is totally optional.

In deze schrijfworkshop begeleidt auteur Roderick Leeuwenhart je bij het schrijven van een kort moordmysterie, zoals de beroemde verhalen die Agatha Christie schreef in de roaring 20s. Je leert schrijftechnieken om spanning op te bouwen en hoe je een goede plotwending kunt creëren -- en dan natuurlijk beginnen met schrijven! Als je niet weet waar je moet beginnen, krijg je verschillende schrijfprompts. Er is geen tijdsdruk om het verhaal tijdens de workshop af te maken, het delen van je resultaten is geheel optioneel.

title: The Dating Show
description: Wanna play a game and find your significant other? Come over and try to win the bachelor’s heart! However, be sure to answer carefully, because answering incorrectly can have deadly consequences.
webDescription:
The Dating Show is a deadly fun game where YOU can come up to the stage and find your perfect match. Will you be the next candidate trying to win the heart of the bachelor? All you have to do is answer 3 questions from the bachelor. However, there is a catch! The bachelor has a trick up their sleeves. After each question the bachelor can eliminate one of the candidates. The bachelor and leftover candidate will walk off into the sunset to their happily ever after! Are you brave enough to play?
 

No sign-up required. You can just show up and participate if you want to, or simply enjoy the show. Be aware that this is a show for entertainment purposes, not to actually match people up.

The Dating Show is een dodelijk leuk spel waarbij JIJ naar het podium kunt komen en je perfecte match kunt vinden. Ben jij de volgende kandidaat die het hart van de bachelor probeert te veroveren? Het enige wat je hoeft te doen is 3 vragen van de bachelor beantwoorden. Er is echter een addertje onder het gras! De vrijgezel heeft een truc in petto. Na elke vraag kan de bachelor één van de kandidaten schrappen. De vrijgezel en de overgebleven kandidaat lopen de zonsondergang in voor hun nog lang en gelukkig leven! Ben je dapper genoeg om te spelen?
 

Geen aanmelding vereist. Je kunt gewoon komen opdagen en meedoen als je wilt, of gewoon genieten van de show. Houd er rekening mee dat dit een show is voor amusementsdoeleinden, niet om mensen daadwerkelijk aan elkaar te koppelen.
ticketsInfo: Amber Huijsmans en Sanne (achternaam is me even ontschoten), amber.huijsmans@gmail.com

title: Shim Sham Workshop
description: It's time to send those toes a-tapping with our Roaring Twenties Shim Sham workshop!
webDescription:
Dance teacher Liesbeth Klünder will (once again) take you on a journey, back to the New York ballrooms of the 20s and 30s of the previous century. In this workshop, you'll learn the century-old Shim Sham routine that's often performed at swing dance events. It's a routine full of Authentic Jazz moves that will fit right in on any dance floor!

The Shim Sham is danced individually, but at the same time, everyone's joined in a great circle. Therefore, it's possible to keep 1.5 meters of distance, if you so desire. Dance experience is certainly not necessary, but enthusiasm is, as you'll learn the routine quite fast.

The dance is appropriate for all ages and conditions. We do recommend that you wear clothing which won't restrict your movement, and not to wear shoes with high heels, nor heavy walking shoes. Please remember your personal hygiene, and bring a bottle of water if you think you'll need one!

Would you like to know more about Authentic Jazz? Then check out the website for Swing Out Loud, Enschede's own Swing Dance association: https://swingoutloud.nl/


-----

Dansdocent Liesbeth Klünder neemt je (nogmaals) mee op een reis naar de ballrooms van New York in de jaren 20 en 30 van de vorige eeuw. In deze workshop leer je de eeuw-oude Shim Sham routine die vaak gedanst wordt op swing dance evenementen. Een routine vol met Authentic Jazz moves die op geen enkele dansvloer zullen misstaan! 

De Shim Sham routine dans je individueel, maar tegelijkertijd ook met z'n allen in een grote cirkel. Het is dus mogelijk om 1,5 meter afstand te houden indien gewenst. Danservaring is zeker niet nodig, maar enige inzet wel, want je leert de routine in sneltreinvaart!

De dans is voor alle leeftijden en condities geschikt. Wel raden we je aan om kleding te dragen waarin je je gemakkelijk kunt bewegen en om geen schoenen met hakken of zware wandelschoenen te dragen. Denk ook aan je persoonlijke hygiëne en neem eventueel een flesje water mee!
 

Meer weten over Authentic Jazz? Kijk dan ook eens op de website van Swing Out Loud, de Swing Dance vereniging van Enschede: https://swingoutloud.nl/

title: Sig Plamo
description: SIG Plamo 2022: Gundams, model building and more!
webDescription:
Animecon 2022 Saturday special edition: 3x SIG Plamo Airbrush Workshop at the stand at 11:00, 14:00 and 17:00. 
If you ever wanted to know more about airbrushing or try it out for yourself. This is your chance!

Apart from our special, and for those who have absolutely no idea what plamo is: it’s about plastic models!
Come visit the SIG Plamo build stand and have a chat with us. Bring your own model, sit down and start building! We’ll have some tools available such that you can join in on the fun. We even have diorama building throughout the convention. Which you can attend for free!! What are you waiting for?

When speaking about Plamo, you can’t go around the huge popularity of Gundam (Gunpla) models. But this is only the tip of the iceberg! There is sooo much more when it comes to Plamo. There are various other kits ranging from historic or military models to popular anime series models such as Dragon Ball, One Piece or Macross. In other words: Plamo is for everyone!

Assembling your model is only the beginning in the world of Plamo. After assembly you can start painting, put decals on or even make a diorama to get the most out of your model. SIG Plamo aspires to amaze you and guide your model building to the next level!

If you've ever wondered what Plamo is about or are already addicted to the process of creating your own models, you should definitely drop by!

See you at the stand!

Jeroen & Yuriy

activityType.longDescription: Continuous events at the event plaza

title: Bagger
description: Anime club BAGGER hosts its Garapon lottery again!
webDescription:
Garapon Lottery by BAGGER

 

Boeren Anime Gilde Groningen En Regio (BAGGER) is the one and only anime club in the north of the Netherlands. At our stand you can find a summary of our meetings this year, join our club and play our Garapon lottery!

Garapon is a lottery in which you spin a wooden bingo wheel, and you may or may not win a prize depending on the color of the ball that comes out. In Japanese “gara” is the sound of a turning bingo wheel and “pon” is the sound the ball makes when it falls out. :3  You can play for only 50 cents, and if you don't win a big prize we'll give you BAGGER's staple candy, a Koetjesreep! Come and try your luck in the Garapon Lottery! Win win win!

activityType.longDescription: Continuous events at the event plaza

title: Ani-Nation
description: Ani-Nation has all kinds of fun activities, like Goldfish scooping, Yut, Takarakuji, and Gonggi
webDescription:
Ani-Nation is Back! They have lots of things to do for you this year!

Goldfish scooping

Goldfish scooping. The long lost art of catching a fish with a mere rice paper bat. Years ago we decided to bring that back to the Netherlands. And with success. It has been a raging success, sporting solo record breakers, to fierce competitions between multiple players. This weekend we bring this awesome game to you. Do you have what it takes to become the one that catches them all? Noactualfishwereharmedduringthetestingofthiseventnoritsactualuse. Weuseplasticdummies.

Takarakuji

Come take a look at our Japanese lottery, Takarakuji! A chance to win fun prizes and test out your luck.

Yut

Yut is often played by the elderly on new years day, but it’s not uncommon to see teens playing when they need a moment of mental rest from a busy, crowded world. Flex your mind in this ancient game that lies somewhere between checkers and Ludo.

Gonggi

Gonggi is a populair chilrdrens-game in Korea. It used to only be played by girls, but these days nobody can pass on this addictive game. It used to played with 5 stones the size of small marbles, but these days it's played with cheerfully colored plastic bars that are filled with iron to give them some weight. 

The game can be played anywhere and anytime and is also known outside of Korea. According to historians the game is originally from Greece and it has become so famous that it's played in different forms across the world. In America it's played with a rubber ball, in China it's played with rubber rings that they fold into chains to toss with.

activityType.longDescription: Continuous events at the event plaza

title: Cosplay Repair Point: De Foamtastische Huiskamer
description: "De Foamtastische Huiskamer" gives your creativity a true powerboost. Find everything for your cosplay creation here.
webDescription:
"De Foamtastische Huiskamer" 

Everything for your creation!

Practicing a creative hobby is good for mental health.

While working on it, you will be fully cut off from reality and let yourself go.
It doesn't really matter which creative hobby you practice. But having a hobby does mean you will regularly need new materials.

Supplies like paint or ink, but also tools and other materials will be needed. Above all a hobbyist wants a regular dependable place where hobby materials can be purchased.

For this, please visit: https://foamtastisch.nl/ 

This edition "De Foamtastische Huiskamer" will have a nicely furnished booth with all materials you need to make nice costumes and cosplays. Our staff and cosplayers love to help you consider the possibilities.

There's a lot to do at their booth. 

  • A Cosplay Repair point where Cosplayers can go to get their outfits fixed.
  • A continuous demo on Superstar face-paint where we'll show you how to paint colors, use templates and the basics for lining and glitter application.
  • Come get your glitter tattoo.

Also, there will be some lectures throughout the weekend where they show you how to work with the materials.

activityType.longDescription: Continuous events at the event plaza

title: Saga of Tanya the Evil ep. 1 - 5
description: It is June of the year CE 1923. A young girl with blond hair and blue eyes, Tanya Degurechaff, has entered the final curriculum of the Imperial Military Academy and is training at the third patrol line in the northern military district, the Norden Theater, as part of her service to the force. Her training, the first step toward a brilliant career as an aviation mage, should have gone off without a hitch... but things took an unexpected turn.
webDescription: We thank Crunchyroll for sponsoring us and allowing us to screen these episodes.

title: EVANGELION:3.33 YOU CAN (NOT) REDO.
description: Shinji wakes after 14 years aboard the battleship AAA Wunder belonging to an anti-NERV organization founded by former NERV members. Shinji hears Rei's voice coming from EVA Mark.09, sent to rescue him, so he leaves Wunder and heads to NERV. Kaworu Nagisa shows Shinji the transformed land. He learns that saving Rei triggered the Near Third Impact that caused the catastrophic damage to Earth.
webDescription:
Most of the world has changed except Shinji Ikari who awakens, unaged in a new and strange environment. Misato has formed a group that is separate from Nerv. The fight is far from over but the biggest struggle might be against humans and former allies.

We thank Periscoop Anime for sponsoring us and allowing us to screen this movie.

title: EVANGELION:1.11 YOU ARE (NOT) ALONE.
description: Scarred by the Second Impact, the Fourth Angel attacks Tokyo III and humanity's fate is left in Special Government Agency NERV's hands. Young Shinji Ikari is forced to pilot EVA-01. He and EVA-00 pilot Rei Ayanami are tasked to fight, but EVA-01 is damaged by the Sixth Angel. Misato Katsuragi draws up a plan to focus all of Japan's electricity into EVA-01's positron cannon to defeat the Angel.
webDescription:
The fate of the world is threatened by seemingly monstrous entities known as Angels. NERV is an organisation set up to counter this threat and it is up to young pilots to protect Earth but exactly what are the real motives behind NERV?

We thank Periscoop Anime for sponsoring us and allowing us to screen this movie.

title: EVANGELION:2.22 YOU CAN (NOT) ADVANCE.
description: Mari Illustrious-Makinami pilots Provisional Unit-05 to defeat the excavated Third Angel. Asuka Langley-Shikinami and EVA-02 defeat the Seventh Angel. The Eighth Angel appears and attacks NERV HQ. EVA-03 is taken over by the Ninth Angel during testing and Shinji deploys to stop it, but learns Asuka is aboard. Gendoh switches EVA-01's controls over to the Dummy System and begins fighting EVA-03...
webDescription:
"In the earliest battles against the monstrous Angels, young Eva pilots Shinji and Rei were forced to carry humanity’s hopes on their shoulders. Now, with the deadly onslaught of the Angels escalating and the apocalyptic Third Impact looming, Shinji and Rei find their burden shared by two new Eva pilots..."

Under constant attack by Angels, NERV introduces two new pilots: the mysterious Makinami Mari Illustrous and the intense Asuka Langley Shikinami. Parallel to the incursion, Gendo Ikari and SEELE proceed the secret project that involves both Rei and Shinji. 

We thank Periscoop Anime for sponsoring us and allowing us to screen this movie.

title: EVANGELION:3․0+1.01 THRICE UPON A TIME
description: Misato and her anti-NERV group Wille arrive at Paris, a city now red from core-ization. Crew from the flagship Wunder land on a containment tower. They only have 720 seconds to restore the city. When a horde of NERV Evas appear, Mari’s improved Eva Unit 8 must intercept. Meanwhile, Shinji, Asuka, and Rei (provisional name) wander about Japan.
webDescription:
The 4th and final installment of Rebuild of Evangelion.

We thank Periscoop Anime for sponsoring us and allowing us to screen this movie.

title: Your Name - NL subbed
description:
From director Makoto Shinkai, the innovative mind behind Voices of a Distant Star and 5 Centimeters Per Second, comes a beautiful masterpiece about time, the thread of fate and the hearts of two young souls. The first major anime movie to be shown in Dutch cinemas and be reviewed in the Dutch papers in over 15 years!

So if you haven't seen it, be sure to watch this spectacular movie at AnimeCon Classic 2022.
webDescription:
Mitsuha is the daughter of the mayor of a small mountain town. She's a straightforward high school girl who lives with her sister and her grandmother and has no qualms about letting it be known that she's uninterested in Shinto rituals or helping her father's electoral campaign. Instead she dreams of leaving the boring town and trying her luck in Tokyo. 

Taki is a high school boy in Tokyo who works part-time in an Italian restaurant and aspires to become an architect or an artist. Every night he has a strange dream where he becomes...a high school girl in a small mountain town.

We thank Periscoop Anime for sponsoring us and allowing us to screen this movie.

title: Weathering with you
description: The summer of his high school freshman year, Hodaka runs away from his remote island home to Tokyo, and quickly finds himself pushed to his financial and personal limits. The weather is unusually gloomy and rainy every day, as if to suggest his future. He lives his days in isolation, but finally finds work as a writer for a mysterious occult magazine. Then one day, Hodaka meets Hina on a busy street corner. This bright and strong-willed girl possesses a strange and wonderful ability: the power to stop the rain and clear the sky
webDescription:
Tokyo is currently experiencing rain showers that seem to disrupt the usual pace of everyone living there to no end. Amidst this seemingly eternal downpour arrives the runaway high school student Hodaka Morishima, who struggles to financially support himself—ending up with a job at a small-time publisher. At the same time, the orphaned Hina Amano also strives to find work to sustain herself and her younger brother

Both fates intertwine when Hodaka attempts to rescue Hina from shady men, deciding to run away together. Subsequently, Hodaka discovers that Hina has a strange yet astounding power: the ability to call out the sun whenever she prays for it. With Tokyo's unusual weather in mind, Hodaka sees the potential of this ability. He suggests that Hina should become a "sunshine girl"—someone who will clear the sky for people when they need it the most.

Things begin looking up for them at first. However, it is common knowledge that power always comes with a hefty price...

We thank Periscoop Anime for sponsoring us and allowing us to screen this movie.

title: Promare
description: PROMARE is a thrilling, grandiose and spectacularly crafted sci-fi action adventure from the creators of Kill la Kill and Gurren Lagann and the first feature film studio Trigger (of Little Witch Academia fame). In which the always half-naked firefighter Galo Thymos, “the world's number one firefighting idiot” takes on frenemy Lio Fotia, the young leader of Mad Burnish, the rebellious outcasts with pyro-kinetic powers.
webDescription:
It was an unprecedented event when the Burnish, flame-wielding mutants, burned down half of the world. Thirty years later, a group of aggressive Burnish call themselves Mad Burnish attack the world again. To extinguish the fire caused by Mad Burnish, Kray Foresight, commander of Republic Promepolis, has formed an Anti-Burnish high-mobility rescue squad fire brigage. In a big fire in a skyscraper, Galo Thymos confronts Lio Fotia, the leader of Mad Burnish and takes him prisoner. However, Lio and other Mad Burnish escape. Galo follows them to their hideout and discovers how hard life is for these mutants and Lio tells Galo the shocking truth about the Burnish

Meanwhile, Lio and Galo know about a secret plan that is proceeding on a global scale.

We thank Periscoop Anime for sponsoring us and allowing us to screen this movie.

title: Dressing rooms
rules:
Dressing rooms rules

Note, these rooms are strictly changing rooms. 

  • Unattended items will be removed.
  • Leave your bags / suitcases / props at the Cloak / Bag room or risk losing them or being thrown out for littering.
  • Due to privacy reasons, camera's are strictly forbidden inside these rooms.
  • Any attempt at taking a picture of the inside of these rooms (including from the outside) will result in a permanent ban from the convention.
description: Cosplay costume are not always the easiest thing to wear when going to a convention. Planes, trains and automobiles can be so costume unfriendly and not everyone wants to wear the same costume all day so we do have changing rooms.
webDescription:
Your normal clothes are not the best thing to wear when going to the disco in the evening, but they are pretty comfortable the rest of the day.
We know of these issues and therefore we have created changing rooms. Here you can comfortably change from one set of clothes to another.

For anyone used to changing in the toilets of the theaterhotel: yes, this is permitted and there is still space in to change in the toilets and they remain clean. But AnimeCon has had decent changing rooms for the last 10 years. So we just put up some screens and made some tables and mirrors available for your use, next to…, well, the toilets that are in the basement.

title: GoCosplayers
description: Cosplay Target + Who's that Pokemon?
webDescription:
Ready to play some unique games? GoCosplayers has got one for cosplayers and one for Pokémon fans.

Cosplay Target
For the cosplayers, they have created Cosplay Target.
With aid of a mobile application you get images of other cosplayers. Try to find them at the convention and score lots of points. In the meanwhile, other cosplayers will be searching for you. If they find you, you will also get points. So be noticeable, or be the one who searches the best to become the Cosplay Target master.

For more information on how to play, visit www.cosplaytarget.com

Who is that Pokémon?
If you are more into Pokémon, they have the game to test your Pokémon knowledge and to see who among your friends is a Pokémon master!
"Who is that Pokémon?" is the question you need to answer the fastest. GoCosplayers shows you a silhouette of a Pokémon, and with a special controller you have to answer who it is. So if you know Pokémon and want to beat your friends to it, be sure to visit them!

Klaar om unieke spellen te spelen? GoCosplayers heeft maar liefst twee spellen! Eén voor de cosplayers en één for de Pokémon fans.

Cosplay Target
Voor de cosplayers is het spel ‘Cosplay Target’ gemaakt. 
Download een app op je smartphone en krijg foto's van andere cosplayers. Zoek ze op de conventie en scoor op deze manier punten. In de tussentijd, zoeken andere cosplayers ook naar jou! Als ze je hebben gevonden, dan verdienen zij weer punten. Dus zorg ervoor dat je wel opvalt zodat mensen je kunnen vinden. Degene die het beste zoekt zal de Cosplay Target master worden!

Voor meer informatie hoe te spelen, bezoek www.cosplaytarget.nl

Who is that Pokémon?
Als Pokémon meer jouw ding is, dan hebben we een spel om jouw Pokémon kennis uit te testen. Wie is er van jouw vriendengroep de echte Pokémon master?
“Wie is deze Pokémon" is de vraag die je het snelste moet beantwoorden! GoCosplayers laten jou een silhouette van een Pokémon zien, met een speciale controller moet je beantwoorden om welke het gaat. Dus als jij Pokémon kent en je vrienden wilt verslaan, zorg dat je erbij bent!

activityType.longDescription: Continuous events at the event plaza

title: Super Smash Bros. Melee
description:
Super Smash Bros. Melee
Tournament hosted by the AFK Esports.

location.name: Amadeus
location.useName: AnimeCon Game Room: powered by AFK Esports

title: GUILTY GEAR -STRIVE-
description: GUILTY GEAR -STRIVE- Tournament hosted by the AFK Esports.

location.name: Amadeus
location.useName: AnimeCon Game Room: powered by AFK Esports

title: Jeopandy
description: Based on the popular American TV show Jeopardy, Kinjin will be hosting a brand new event named Jeopandy!
webDescription: Form teams and give an answer in the form of a question! Choose from various Japanese categories and score points based on the difficulty of the question. Come one, come all, because the best team wins a prize.
prizes: Wij vragen hiervoor 2 prijzen die je over een team kan verdelen (uitdeelbaar voedsel is altijd een goed idee)

title: Jan Ken Pon
description: Jan Ken Pon is the most exciting form of rock paper scissors you'll ever experience!
webDescription: With a paper fan on your right and a plastic bowl on your left you'll have the necessary tools to attack and defend against your opponents. The physical aspect adds another layer to this fierce mindgame heavy battle! Join this activity and prepare to play Jan Ken Pon!

title: SPY x FAMILY ep. 1-5
description: World peace is at stake and secret agent Twilight must undergo his most difficult mission yet—pretend to be a family man. Posing as a loving husband and father, he’ll infiltrate an elite school to get close to a high-profile politician. He has the perfect cover, except his wife’s a deadly assassin and neither knows each other’s identity. But someone does, his adopted daughter who’s a telepath!
webDescription: We thank Crunchyroll for sponsoring us and allowing us to screen these episodes.

title: Taisho Otome Fairy Tale ep. 1-5
description: It is late 1921, the 10th year of the Taishō era. Tamahiko Shima, second son of the wealthy Shima family, has his life turned upside-down after his right arm is paralyzed in a car accident that also claims the life of his mother. Now seen as worthless to his calculating father's long-term plans for his business empire, his family treats him as “dead”. But since it would bring shame to the family were they to disown him outright, he instead finds himself shunted off to a villa in the mountains of Chiba, out of public view. Though he quickly resigns himself to the idea that he will die alone and forgotten, one snowy December night a girl appears at his doorstep and announces that she is there to be his live-in caretaker, and when she is old enough, his bride.
webDescription:
The girl, named Yuzuki Tachibana, or “Yuzu” for short, was purchased from her impoverished home by Tamahiko's father, and while she too finds herself uprooted from her home and family, she throws herself into her new role with gusto.

Tamahiko is initially extremely cynical and depressed due to his exile, and Yuzuki's irrepressibly sunny disposition grates on his nerves at first, but her presence gradually helps brighten his mood. In time, Tamahiko and Yuzuki fall in love. In 1922, Tamahiko's younger sister, Tamako, visits the couple, and, though initially cold, warms up to Yuzuki. They also meet Ryō Atsumi, the older sister and caretaker of a number of younger siblings, who teases, picks on and steals from Tamahiko. However, she grows close to him and Yuzu, and Tamahiko helps her younger siblings with school.

In 1923, Yuzuki and one of Ryō's brothers, Ryotaro, leave for Tokyo - the former to see her friend from school, and the latter to pursue an apprenticeship. However, they are caught up in the 1923 Great Kantō earthquake, leading Tamahiko and Ryō to walk to Tokyo, with Tamahiko leaving his house open as a temporary shelter for the affected population in his town. Tamahiko finds Yuzuki, bringing her to a temporary hospital run by his estranged uncle. After the earthquake, the famous singer Kotori Shiratori visits Chiba and plays a show with Yuzuki and Ryō attending. Later on, Tamahiko returns to school, passing the entrance exams and making friends with Kotori's twin brother, Hakaru. Kotori visits Yuzuki and Tamahiko and asks them about love to support her songwriting.

Yuzu suddenly leaves one day, and Tamahiko falls back into his depressed state. It is revealed that the heir to the Shima family, Tamaki, has died, and Tamahiko, despite being previously ostracized, is invited back into the family to serve as heir. As a result, Yuzuki is assigned to become the wife of Tamahiko's brother Tamao. Tamahiko goes back to Tokyo, gets Yuzuki back, and cuts ties with his father, with Tamako and Tamao following him, leaving only the oldest sister, Tamayo, to succeed the Shima family. In preparation for their wedding, Tamahiko and Yuzuki visit Yuzuki's family in Iwate. Eventually, Tamahiko takes Yuzuki's last name, Tachibana, and becomes a teacher. Tamao and Tamako are adopted by their uncle.

title: Making Texture Patterns in your Foam
description: De Foamtastische Huiskamer will live up to their name by sharing some vital knowledge regarding cosplay foam.
webDescription: In his lecture, Evan will focus on applying patterns in your foam, such as wood grain. This can be done with various tools and each has a different result. If you're interested in working with cosplay foam, be sure to stop by!

title: JOKER GAME ep. 1-5
description: In autumn of 1937, as the coals of World War II are beginning to smolder, Lt. Col. Yuuki of the Imperial Army secretly establishes a spy training organization called the "D Agency." Those chosen as members of the agency, in opposition to the national trend toward reverence of native-born soldiers in the army, are civilian university graduates who pass the superhuman selection test with flying colors. Under the resourceful Lieutenant Colonel Yuuki, they learn not only how to work with gunpowder, wireless communications, vehicles, and airplanes, but also various skills essential for spies...

title: Mars Red ep. 1-5
description: It’s 1923, and until recently, vampires kept to the shadows. When the mysterious blood source Ascra appears, their numbers swell, leaving Japan covered in bodies. In response, the government spawns its own coven to infiltrate the dark. With S-rank vampire Defrott and the rookie Kurusu, this kill squad is made for one reason: to hunt the undead. Bloodsuckers beware; the night belongs to Code Zero!
webDescription: We thank Crunchyroll for sponsoring us and allowing us to screen these episodes.

title: Joran the princess of snow and blood ep. 1-5
description: The year is 1931. Prince Tokugawa Yoshinobu holds absolute control over Japan. Remnants of the Meiji era’s culture can be seen around the city, but scientific technology and Japanese esoteric cosmology Onmyodo are also developing. Yet lurking behind the glitz is Kuchinawa, a dissident group planning the assassination of the prince. Tasked to extinguish these dissidents is Nue, the government’s secret executioner group. Sawa Yukimura, who works for this organization, suffered at the hands of the Kuchinawa boss. Her entire family was murdered and she dedicated her life to avenging their death.
webDescription: We thank Crunchyroll for sponsoring us and allowing us to screen these episodes.

title: 91 Days ep. 1-5
description: During Prohibition, the law held no power and the mafia ruled the town. The story takes place in Lawless, a town thriving on black market sales of illicitly brewed liquor. One day, Avilio receives a letter from a mysterious sender, prompting him to return to Lawless for revenge. He then infiltrates the Vanetti family, the ones responsible for his family's murder, and sets about befriending the don's son, Nero, to set his vengeance in motion. Killing brings more killing, and revenge spawns more revenge. How will the 91-day story of these men guided by a tragic fate end?

title: Shadows House ep. 1-5
description: High atop a cliff sits the mansion known as Shadows House, home to a faceless clan that pretends to live like nobles. They express their emotions through living dolls that also endlessly clean the home of soot. One such servant, Emilico, aids her master Kate as they learn more about themselves and the mysteries of the house.
webDescription: We thank Crunchyroll for sponsoring us and allowing us to screen these episodes.

title: Smile of the Arsnotoria
description: In the magical academic city of Ashram, girls known as Pentagrams study general education, magic, and etiquette to become proper ladies. Hidden from the rest of the world, the school is like a secret garden that is home to blossoming flowers. However, bugs sensitive to magic may target and trample them; as one of their tasks, the girls must exterminate these insects.
webDescription: The smileless Pentagram Arsnotoria lives in the fifth dorm house alongside her adored roommates: the cheerful Mell, the self-paced Little Alberta, the confident Picatrix, and the cool Abramelin. No matter what time of day, they hang out together as much as possible, and even throw tea parties in their secret room after completing their duties. The girls live in peace as they work toward their goal—but there may be more to Ashram and the Pentagrams beyond the calm life they have come to cherish.

title: Love After World Domination ep. 1-5
description: It’s love at first sight for Fudo and Desumi, except it was during a battle of life and death. Fudo, leader of the hero squad Gelato 5, and Desumi, the Death Queen of the evil society Gekko, have found themselves caught in a forbidden love—and it’s their first relationship! Moving in secrecy, they live holding hands with one weapon in the other, finding out what’s truly fair in love and war.

title: Dropkick on My Devil! ep. 1-5
description:
Jashin-chan looks back on the day Hanazono Yurine summoned her. So long as Yurine lives, Jashin-chan can't return to Hell. So Jashin-chan writes Yurine's name in her "Death NOT" and swears that she's finally going to land that dropkick on Yurine.

Meanwhile, a former subordinate of Pekola and Poporon, Pino, shows up. Pekola is overjoyed believing God has finally sent someone to bring her home; however, in Pino's hand is a weapon...

title: Sleepy Princess in the Demon Castle ep. 1-5
description: The story follows Princess Syalis, a young princess who was kidnapped by the Demon King, and her quest to sleep well while imprisoned.[4] Despite the Demon King's best attempts, the princess turns her kidnapping into a vacation; having grown tired with the stress of a royal life, she is indifferent to the situation.
webDescription: We thank Crunchyroll for sponsoring us and allowing us to screen these episodes.

title: JUJUTSU KAISEN ep. 1-5
description: Yuji Itadori is a boy with tremendous physical strength, though he lives a completely ordinary high school life. One day, to save a classmate who has been attacked by curses, he eats the finger of Ryomen Sukuna, taking the curse into his own soul. From then on, he shares one body with Ryomen Sukuna. Guided by the most powerful of sorcerers, Satoru Gojo, Itadori is admitted to Tokyo Jujutsu High School, an organization that fights the curses... and thus begins the heroic tale of a boy who became a curse to exorcise a curse, a life from which he could never turn back.

title: Mieruko-chan ep. 1-5
description: She can see dead people…she just chooses to ignore them. That’s Miko’s plan, anyway, with horrifying (and sometimes hilarious) results.
webDescription:
Miko Yotsuya's eyes water as she fixates on a single spot on her phone—she ignores yet another dreadful, horrific monster that is in her face, uttering the disturbing words: "Can you see me?" Before now, Miko enjoyed her unassuming high school days, with late-night horror shows serving only as a form of entertainment. But ever since one fateful day, she is the only person aware of the invisible monsters walking freely among humans.

Courageously, Miko makes a bold decision: she will never, under any condition, acknowledge the presence of the horrid specters. However, even though she pretends they do not exist, she can still see how they disturb the people around her, especially her best friend, the energetic and lovely Hana Yurikawa. In order to protect them from the monsters' annoyances, Miko gives it her best to continue her school life and avoid every troublesome crisis—even when they scare her to tears.

We thank Crunchyroll for sponsoring us and allowing us to screen these episodes.

title: Cosplay Armour Shaping Patterns
description: Are you interested in cosplay armour? Don't miss out on de Foamtastische Huiskamer's armour patterning workshop!
webDescription: We'll start with a bracer pattern, which is the basis for all patterns. From there, we can upgrade to for instance a pauldron, which stands off of the body, or the round shape of chest armour.

title: Cosplay Painting Demo
description: Hosted by de Foamtastische Huiskamer, it's the exciting cosplay painting demo!
webDescription: In this live demonstration, we will show some of the latest colors of acrylic paint and how to apply them on foam, fabric and primed foam so you can see everything and how well it bends along with the material. We will also touch on the basics: from priming to shading.

title: Mushoku Tensei: Jobless Reincarnation ep. 1-5
description: When a 34-year-old underachiever gets run over by a bus, his story doesn't end there. Reincarnated in a new world as an infant, Rudy will seize every opportunity to live the life he's always wanted. Armed with new friends, some freshly acquired magical abilities, and the courage to do the things he's always dreamed of, he's embarking on an epic adventure—with all of his past experience intact!

title: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba ep. 1-5
webDescription: Though devastated by this grim reality, Tanjiro resolves to become a “demon slayer” so that he can turn his sister back into a human, and kill the demon that massacred his family.

title: In/Spectre ep. 1-5
description: Iwanaga Kotoko became the god of wisdom to the supernatural beings and spends her days solving problems for them. However, the boy who she fell head over heels for, Sakuragawa Kuro, is someone that is feared by all supernatural creatures. The two of them face various mysterious incidents involving the supernatural in this love x romance x mystery series. Where will these fantastical incidents lead them and what will happen with Kotoko’s crush?
webDescription: We thank Crunchyroll for sponsoring us and allowing us to screen these episodes.

title: ODDTAXI ep. 1-5
description:
This town should look familiar, but suddenly, it's not.
The taxi driver Odokawa lives a very mundane life. He has no family, doesn't really hang out with others, and he's an oddball who is narrow-minded and doesn't talk much. The only people he can call his friends are his doctor, Gouriki and his classmate from high school, Kakibana.
All of his patrons seem to be slightly odd themselves. The college student who wants to be noticed online, Kabasawa. A nurse with secrets, Shirakawa. A comedy duo, the Homosapiens... All these mundane conversations somehow lead to a girl who's gone missing.

title: Ranking of Kings ep. 1-5
description:
How prosperous your nation is, how many powerful warriors it boasts, and how heroic and strong its king is. These are the criteria that factor into the system known as the Ranking of Kings.
The main character, Bojji, was born the first prince of the kingdom ruled by King Bossu, who is ranked number seven.
webDescription:
But Bojji was born unable to hear and is so powerless that he can’t even swing a sword. In consequence, his own retainers and the public, look down upon him as completely unfit to be king.
It is then that Bojji finds his first friend, Kage, and Bojji’s life takes a dramatic turn…

title: Nama Sake Tasting
rules:
• You need to show some ID to proof you are 18 years or older.
  • Must not be the designated driver.
  • Please refrain from talking during the presentation.
  • Feel free to talk when tasting the sake.

Additional information

  • As it is a tasting you do not have to finish each drink, though you are free to do so.
  • As we are concerned about our visitor's health, there is water available to drink.
  • You do not need to “clean your palate” with water between each sake, though again you are free to do so.
description: In 2009 we organized our first sake tasting in the Theaterhotel Almelo. To celebrate our return to Almelo we organize two special tastings for the connoisseurs. On Friday we will present you with 5 Nama or unpasteurized sake.
webDescription:
Using just the simple ingredients of rice, pure water and koji (a type of yeast), brewers in Japan create a wide variety of sake. Or as they call it in Japan: Nihonshu. Add in some extra ingredients and the variety explodes.

This tour you will let you taste 5 different kinds of unpasteurized sake. While standard sake should be stored a cool and dark environment to keep, unpasteurized sake's need to be actively refrigerated until consumption. This makes it though to get in Europe, but when the going gets tough, we call Simon and he delivers the goods! 

Without pasteurization, Sake can easily deteriorate by a type of lactic acid bacteria, called ‘Hiochi Kin’ in Japanese. If any of the bacteria gets into Sake, the Sake becomes white and cloudy with bad odor. This is why most of the sake you ever drank was pasteurized. The disadvantage is that pasteurization changes the taste of the sake: Nama sake usually have a fresher taste and fruitier aroma.

The Nama sake's you will be tasting during this tasting are:

  • Tsukino Katsura Junmai Nigori sparkling
  • Denshin Haru Spring Junmai Ginjo
  • Kozaemon Sakura Junmai Ginjo
  • Kozaemon Dewasansan Junmai Ginjo
  • Mutsu Hassen Junmai Daiginjo

Your tour guide, as always, will be Simon Hofstra who has been introducing us to new sake since 2009. He gained in-depth knowledge of sake as sommelier at the Okura hotel, then brought quality sake to Dutch supermarkets working for Vinites. Currently, he is one of the powers behind sake.nl as the owner of Taste of Sake.

If you want to dive even deeper into the world of sake, you can also take one of the sake courses of the Wine & Spirit Education Trust, where you will meet Simon as instructor. He also hosts our introductory tastings in de Broodfabriek at our regular edition in June.

To give these tasting the ambiance these sake's require, we will hold the tastings in the most exclusive room in the hotel, only ever rented out to AnimeCon: de Oude Societeit. And of course the servers serve the sake in style as well!

After the tasting you will find Simon in the Ravel bar where you can order more of the sake you liked the most!

title: The Taste of Japanese Gin no. 3
rules:
• You need to show some ID to proof you are 18 years or older.
  • Must not be the designated driver.
  • Please refrain from talking during the presentation.
  • Feel free to talk when tasting the sake.

Additional information

  • As it is a tasting you do not have to finish each drink, though you are free to do so.
  • As we are concerned about our visitor's health, there is water available to drink.
  • You do not need to “clean your palate” with water between each gin, though again you are free to do so.
description:
Gin... the final frontier....
At the Regular AnimeCon we tasted quite some interesting gins. There was only one problem. All but one of them were centered around Yuzu! This time, we'll blast beyond the mere border of Japanese citrus!
webDescription:
What to think of a Gin aged for about a year in ex bourbon whisky casks? Would you expect to taste licorice? I sure did not! How about Gin made with black tea as focus? How about Strawberries or Mikan tangerines from Sakurajima island?
What to think of Gin aged in an Islay whisky barrel from Kilchoman? Can you imagine what the smokiness does to the normally Yuzu based gin from Kyoto distillery? How about a Matcha driven gin?

All these weird and wonderful Gins do deserve a starting point. For that, I have chosen a Yuzu driven Gin by Sakurao distillery. I hope you enjoy!

Because some of these Gins are quite rare, we only have 30 tickets for this event. We have managed to keep the price acceptable at only €32. This includes a 25cl bottle of tonic to add to your gins. 

Please do note that we will be trying the Gins neat first and add tonic later.

title: The Whisky Bar
description: Relax and partake in some great drams on the Saturday evening. Drink whisky like a Sir in the stylish Oude Sociëteit restaurant right after the Nama Sake tasting.
webDescription:
After we've casually checked that you are 18, you can buy a drink of one of our chairman's private stock whiskies. With a scala of over 300 Japanese whiskies to choose from, Niels will bring some of his favourites to Almelo.

You can try them by the glass for a reasonable rate and ask him about the history of the bottle in question. Glassware must be returned to the bar before you exit the restaurant.

title: Cosplay Lipsync Battle
rules:
Everybody can participate, but you will have to get on stage in cosplay.

Choose a song that fits your character/performance. It does not have to be from the same source as your cosplay.

The song can be a maximum of 8 minutes long.

Our jury will judge you on multiple points.
 

To participate you can send an email to: events@nishicon.nl and give us:

- Your full name, and possibly your cosplay name

- The song that you want to use (in mp3, as an attachment or a cloud link)

- Which character you will be cosplaying

- Will you be needing any props on stage?

---

Iedereen kan meedoen, maar deelnemers dienen wel in cosplay/kostuum te zijn.

Kies muziek uit die past bij het karakter dat je uitbeeldt. De muziek hoeft dus niet uit de serie te komen van de cosplay zelf.

Het nummer wat je kiest mag maximaal 8 minuten duren.

Er is een jury die je beoordeelt op meerdere punten. 
 

Om mee te doen kun je een e-mail sturen naar:  events@nishicon.nl  Vermeld hierbij:

- Je voor- en achternaam, en eventueel cosplaynaam

- Het nummer dat je wilt gebruiken (in mp3, als bijlage of via cloud) 

- Welk personage je uitbeeldt.

- Of je props nodig hebt op het podium.
description: Hosted by Nishicon, the Cosplay Lip Sync Battle gives cosplayers the opportunity to give a spectacular performance on stage!
webDescription:
Participants will give an energetic playback show with a song of their choosing, and will attempt to blow away our jury to win first prize! Please check out the rules for more information on how to participate!


----

Deelnemers geven een energieke playback show met hun zelf gekozen nummer, en proberen hiermee onze jury weg te blazen om de eerste prijs te winnen! Lees alsjeblieft de regels voor meer informatie over hoe je mee kan doen!
prizes: Als er nog prijsjes over zijn, graag, maar Nishi zorgt zelf ook voor trofeeen.

title: Night is Short, Walk On Girl
description: “Senpai” is in love with “Otome” secretly.He seeks her at Ponto-cho at night, at the used book market at Shimogamo Shrine, at the university fair… But she never realizes how he feels, and each time he “happens” to run into her, she simply says “What a coincidence!”
webDescription:
A series of unusual events with a cast of unique characters awaits them.

The Guerilla Theater play “Henkutsuou” (“The Codger of Monte Cristo”) will appear as a play-within- the-anime in the form of a complete musical.  
Otome, the Director, Don Underwear, and Senpai will all sing!

You’ll also see familiar faces from “The Tatami Galaxy”.

Will Senpai ever get her to realize his love?

©Tomihiko Morimi,KADOKAWA/NAKAME COMMITTEE

title: The House of the Lost on the Cape
description: 17-year-old run-away Yui and 8-year-old Hiyori, who lost her family and her voice, have no place to go when they run into Kiwa, a strange old lady. She offers them a place to stay, in a slightly banged-up old house overlooking the sea, a Mayoiga.
webDescription:
Despite joining Kiwa on a whim, the two girls find comfort in Mayoiga, a legendary house, said to look after lost travelers, and the warm hospitality of Kiwa. Both girls’ damaged hearts begin to heal little by little.

Until one day, a variety of strange beings which Kiwa calls “Fushigitto” begin popping up around the house…

©Sachiko Kashiwaba,KODANSHA/2021 The House of the Lost on the Cape Committee.

title: The Wonderland
description:
A wonderful and mysterious birthday adventure, one that you will never forget. Beyond the basement door in Aunt Chi’s antique shop lies a world beyond your wildest imagination…
Akane Uesugi is a shy 6th grader who has trouble telling other people how she feels.
webDescription:
The day before her birthday, her mother, Midori, sends her on an errand: to go get her birthday present from her free-spirited Aunt Chi’s antique shop. But a strange man named Hippocrates the Alchemist, who calls her the “Green Goddess”, together with Pipo the fairy, takes her on a journey to “The World Beyond” from a door in the basement.

There, the water has dried up and the trees are losing their color. Can she save it with the help of her free-spirited Aunt Chi, the stern Hippocrates, and his apprentice Pipo?

©Sachiko Kashiwaba,KODANSHA/2019 Birthday Wonderland Committee.

title: Classic Anime Room
description: Each night we will show 2 different movies and 3 or 4 different series. The oldest is from 1972 the most recent are from 2001, with a nice spread among them.
webDescription:
This program shows you how Anime came to be. Se be prepared on Friday for:

  • one of the first super sentai series,
  • how harem series started out,
  • the origin of the haughty female laugh,
  • just some old school SF,
  • fan service predating Evangelion.

On Saturday we wiil show:

  • just a beautiful movie with aliens and high school kids,
  • early boob missiles (just a tad slower than running),
  • panty shots galore,
  • crazy family fan service,
  • something SF-like with girls that tries to have a story…
  • maids like they used to be.

title: The Saga of Tanya the Evil - the Movie
description: In 2019, thanks to our sponsor Crunchyroll, our main feature movie was the European premiere of The movie of the Saga of Tanya the Evil. In 2022 the movie is in theme for our fesitval! The movie shows the events taking place between the first season and second season of the saga. The theme song "Remembrance" just happens to be performed by our 2019 main act MYTH & ROID.
webDescription:
The time is UC 1926. The Imperial Army’s 203rd Air Mage Battalion led by Major Tanya Degurechaff has won the battle to the south against the Republic’s stragglers. They expected to be given a vacation after returning victorious, but instead receive special orders from Staff HQ as soon as they get home. They are told that there were signs of a large-scale deployment near the Empire-Federation border. Faced with the prospect of a new major enemy, the desperate Empire fans the flame of war.

Meanwhile, an international volunteer army spearheaded by the Commonwealth set foot in Federation territory. As they say, the enemy of an enemy is the best friend you could possibly have. They suffer through misfortune purely out of national interest, and among them is a young girl. She is Warrant Officer Mary Sue, and she takes up arms hoping to bring the Empire, who killed her father, to justice.

title: Surprise movie
description: The surprise movie is a... surprise. If you want to know the title, you will just have to go the the Heyermans on Sunday. Bring your handkerchiefs though, as is a sad movie and this will be the end of the festival.

title: Re: Zero the frozen bond
description: Before Natsuki Subarufound himself transported to another world, the beautiful girl with silver hair had her own adventure in Elior Forest.
webDescription: Covered in ice and snow, Elior Forest is the home to dangerous magical beasts and 50 elves frozen in ice. One day, the great spirit Puck helps a young girl break out of her ice prison. Her name is Emilia, a half-elf born with silver hair, long ears, and amethyst eyes—features that resemble the evil Witch who destroyed half the world long ago. Shunned by society because of her appearance, Emilia dwells in the forest with Puck as her sole companion and family. Burdened with a sin of destruction she does not remember committing, she spends her days trying to find a way to help her frozen kin. But when the great spirit Melakuera, the Arbitrator of the world, finds Emilia, her right to stay alive is brought into question. Will the bonds of ice she formed with Puck prove to be the warm thread that defies fate?

title: Roaring Twenties Dance
description: This event will take you back to those wild, carefree times that celebrated the end of the war with newfound frivolity. Every visitor is invited to stop by and move their feet.
webDescription:
Ah yes, the Roaring Twenties. The time of flappers, gangsters, speakeasies and, of course, MUSIC. The 1920s became known as the Jazz Age; music was redefined and with the increase in clubs; dancing was all the rage. We're talking the Shimmy, the Buzzard Lope, the Chicken Scratch, the Monkey Glide and the Bunny Hug. And let's not forget the Charleston, the Lindy Hop and the Foxtrot!

With that in mind, AnimeCon is proud to present the Roaring Twenties Dance! Taking place on Friday evening in our Ravel room, this event will take you back to those wild, carefree times that celebrated the end of the war with newfound frivolity. Every visitor is invited to stop by and move their feet.

But wait! There's more! What would a dance be without live music? That's right, a band will be playing for two whole hours, filling the room with the traditional sound of the 1920s! This year, exclusive to AnimeCon Classic, we're proud to welcome Schw!ng Jazz Band! 

Schw!ng Jazz Band was formed in 2017 by four strapping young lads looking to bring the golden age of jazz to dance floors across the land. Since then, they have toured the U.K, Europe and the U.S. They recorded their debut album Boogaloose in 2019. Their line-up is: saxophone, guitar, double-bass and drums. With all four singing as well, Schw!ng bring an irresistible energy wherever they go. This is rip-roaring jazz to get your toes tapping and your dresses flapping! So hop on by and cut a rug!


The voluntary dress code:
Of course, the evening would be even better is we dress appropriately, so as to enforce the ambiance of that time period. This is not mandatory, simply a little encouragement from us to go out on a limb and ease yourself into the theme. Don't know what to wear? No need to worry! It's really quite simple.

Suggestions for typical 20s gear: the flapper dress, a 'house dress', a neat suit (with or without hat), a tuxedo, a 'barber shop' outfit... Even work-wear such as overalls and suspenders over a plain shirt will do! If choosing the latter, the typical newsboy cap is highly recommended to complete the ensemble, as well as a bow tie or regular tie.

title: Mahjong
description: Come check out the mahjong workshops at Club Wester Wind!
webDescription: We are a club dedicated to teaching riichi mahjong to young enthousiasts by hosting workshops and tournaments at events. We teach the game in several steps to introduce new people to the basics of mahjong. First, we teach them how to make sets and form a winning hand. As soon as they start to get the hang of it, we will start introducing simple hand structures and points. At bigger events we host tournaments. This attracts people who are a bit more experienced and seek a challenge.

title: Guadalcanal and Raubal: U.S. vs. Japan
description: Guadalcanal was the turning point of the land war with Japan in the Second World War. Japan never went further South than this island in the Solomons. However: Guadalcanal was just one of the many battles for the fortress of Rabaul.
webDescription:
Japan tried to sever the link between the U.S. and Australia by occupying the Solomon islands and New Guinea. They started building airbases at Rabaul and Guadalcanal. The base at Guadalcanal was put to good use by the Americans after their invasion on the 7th of August 1942.

In this military history lecture we will not just describe how "iron bottom sound" got that name and the battleship-bombardment of the airfield on Guadalcanal. We will describe the air battle for Rabaul, the land battles for New Guinea as well as those for New Georgia, Bougainville, New Ireland and New Britain and the sea battles in the Coral en Bismarck seas.

We will explain the role of signals intelligence in this 7-month combined land, sea and air battle, as well as the death of admiral Yamamoto. The fighting in New Guinea and the consequent battle for Rabaul will be visited as well in order to give a complete picture of Japanese and American strategy and tactics.

This is a second chance for a lecture Matijs gave at AnimeCon 2019 but could not finish.
